legacy.full_text: CGTNRadio host Liu Kun @KunkunkunLiu said in an interview with #AsiaPrime from Indonesian's Metro Globe Network that China has called for all efforts to resolve the Ukraine crisis in a peaceful way. @mglobenetwork https://t.co/YIB3LcSJRC

Part of my interview with "Asia Prime" show on @mglobenetwork . 

Points I made: 1) Lives have been lost--this could and should've been avoided. 2) Future security structure in European continent needs to accodomate concerns from all sides;

legacy.description: Journalist in Beijing via Washington. My views. 📮: kunliu20142014@gmail.com
legacy.name: Kun LIU

legacy.full_text: 3) the "international consensus" on the Ukraine issue--often citied by some western analysts--is in fact the consensus by a few U.S.-led western governments.

legacy.full_text:
UK politicians need a new narrative on China, and a new narrative means a new strategy, a strategy of their own. “Systemic challenge”, “repressive at home”, “assertive abroad”…these are all America’s words. 

 https://t.co/jChvthlHgH

legacy.description: Journalist in Beijing via Washington. My views. 📮: kunliu20142014@gmail.com
legacy.name: Kun LIU

legacy.full_text: Sadly it seems the UK does not have meaningful foreign policy these days. It follows in lockstep with America’s foreign policy. But the question is: how often can UK’s national interest be totally aligned with that of America’s?

legacy.full_text:
Wang Yi: fate / destiny of the Middle East should be in the hands of the people in the mid-east region. #saudi #Iran 

https://t.co/8M9t6PCMpp
“第一，这个世界并不是只有乌克兰问题，还有很多事关和平、涉及民生的问题，需要国际社会予以关注，需要当事方及时妥善处理。”

legacy.description: Journalist in Beijing via Washington. My views. 📮: kunliu20142014@gmail.com
legacy.name: Kun LIU

legacy.full_text: “第二，无论问题多复杂，挑战多尖锐，只要本着相互尊重的精神进行平等对话，就一定能够找到彼此都能接受的解决办法。”

legacy.description: Journalist in Beijing via Washington. My views. 📮: kunliu20142014@gmail.com
legacy.name: Kun LIU

legacy.full_text: “第三，中东是中东人民的中东，中东地区的命运应该掌握在中东各国人民手中。相信中东各国将进一步弘扬独立自主精神，加强团结协作，携手建设更加和平、稳定、繁荣的中东。”

legacy.full_text:
A little more thought should also be given on the range of topics Qin Gang touched upon during his debut appearance as foreign minister at the annual political meetings. 
https://t.co/uErXVgdq3R

legacy.description: Journalist in Beijing via Washington. My views. 📮: kunliu20142014@gmail.com
legacy.name: Kun LIU

legacy.full_text: He then said Chinese diplomacy isn't short of honesty, sincerity and good will, but Chinese diplomats will certainly defend and protect China's interests if these interests are infringed upon.

legacy.description: Journalist in Beijing via Washington. My views. 📮: kunliu20142014@gmail.com
legacy.name: Kun LIU

legacy.full_text: His message is two-fold. One, "wolf warrior diplomacy" is a man-made narrative trap intended to vilify Chinese diplomacy. Two, like diplomats of any country, Chinese diplomats are merely doing their job.

legacy.full_text: #Chinese Foreign Minister Qin Gang: The so-called "establishing guardrails" and "not seeking conflict" simply means that #China should not respond in words or action when slandered or attacked. That is just impossible! https://t.co/Rg9yPhDEJr
Qin Gang provides China's positions and perspectives in his debut as foreign minister at China's Two Sessions political meetings.

legacy.description: Journalist in Beijing via Washington. My views. 📮: kunliu20142014@gmail.com
legacy.name: Kun LIU

legacy.full_text: and the U.S. idea of fair competition means making rules that work in the interests of the U.S. and against China.

legacy.description: Journalist in Beijing via Washington. My views. 📮: kunliu20142014@gmail.com
legacy.name: Kun LIU

legacy.full_text: He also called on the U.S. to respect China's rise: in the process of "Making America Great Again," he said the U.S. should also consider embracing an open attitude that allows for China's development.
